General.Name: Shanghai Baolijia Chemical Co. Ltd.
General.Description: Shanghai Baolijia Chemical Co., Ltd. researches, develops, produces, and sells emulsions in the People's Republic of China and internationally. The company offers architectural emulsions, waterproof emulsions, textile emulsions, textile additives, packaging emulsions, additives, and other functional products, as well as construction field and industrial paint emulsions. Shanghai Baolijia Chemical Co., Ltd. was founded in 2001 and is headquartered in Shanghai, the People's Republic of China.
